comment.author: 40415695@N00
comment._content: I was looking for a picture talking about grace bros, My wife and I stayed at the building that is now the Grace Hotel when we stayed in Sydney in 2008. Very awesome historic building

comment.realname: State Library of New South Wales
comment.author: 29454428@N08
comment._content: This photograph was taken at Grace Brothers Broadway store, not the building you stayed in. For a picture of the Grace Buidling which you stayed in, see: acms.sl.nsw.gov.au/search/simpleSearch.aspx?authority=pla...
comment.authorname: State Library of New South Wales collection
